backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s full data model including leads, customers, attendance, messaging, queries, templates, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their functionality and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app at #root and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with CRM and customer routes, global theming, error boundary, and app layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AgentPanelSectio: Implements agent management UI with search, approval actions, and statistics using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceSectio: Provides attendance tracking UI with check‑in/out, camera capture, geolocation, record tables, and CSV export.
frontend/src/components/CustomerAppLinkS: Displays a sharable customer portal link with copy and open actions and usage instructions.
frontend/src/components/CustomerQueriesS: Manages customer queries for admins and agents, including creation, validation, listing, and status updates.
frontend/src/components/CustomersSection: Provides paginated customer management with listing, adding new customers, and form handling.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Shows key CRM metrics such as customer counts, leads, queries, and follow‑ups with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches UI errors and displays a recovery interface with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpsSection: Handles scheduling, listing, and completing follow‑up tasks tied to customers and leads.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with branding, user profile display, theme toggle, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadsSection.tsx: Displays and manages leads with filtering, pagination, creation, status updates, and assignment features.
frontend/src/components/MessagingSection: Provides a messaging interface with conversation selection, message viewing, sending, and participant search.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their name, email, and role.
frontend/src/components/TemplatesSection: Manages message templates by category, allowing creation, copying, and setting default follow‑up templates.
frontend/src/components/TicketsSection.t: Empty placeholder component for ticket functionality.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppLogsSect: Shows WhatsApp follow‑up message logs for admins or agents, with timestamps, statuses, and linked lead names.
UI for configuring WhatsApp API settings and sending manual WhatsApp messages using customers and templates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerAuth.ts: Manages customer phone-based auth via localStorage and provides login, logout, registration, and profile query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerQueries.ts: Provides hooks for submitting customer queries, fetching queries by phone number, and retrieving confirmation messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity login, storing identities, and managing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user, customer, lead, WhatsApp, attendance, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining color variables and light/dark theme styles.
frontend/src/lib/csvUtils.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV attendance report by formatting record fields and constructing a blob for download.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalPendingPage.t: Empty page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/CRMApp.tsx: Handles authentication flow, profile fetching, error states, and routes users to login or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Renders customer dashboard with tabs, forms for submitting queries, profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerLoginPage.tsx: Provides customer login and registration forms with validation and mutation triggers.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Controls customer authentication flow, showing loader, errors, login, or dashboard based on state.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays main dashboard with multiple tabbed sections and admin‑conditional views.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Manages Internet Identity login and user profile setup with validation and save operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements related to fixing dashboard load failures and improving error messaging.
